Key Features

Feature

Description

Version Control

Manage and track every change to configuration files, software versions, and system settings. This provides a complete audit trail and allows for easy rollback to previous known-good states.

Automation

Streamline the deployment of configurations and updates across multiple systems. Our automation capabilities ensure consistency and reduce the manual effort required to manage large and complex environments.

Centralized Repository (CMDB)

Store all configuration data in a single, centralized location. This Configuration Management Database (CMDB) provides a single source of truth for all IT assets and their relationships, facilitating easy access, auditing, and recovery.

Integration with Verto Wave Portfolio

IT Service Management (ITSM)

Integration with our ITSM solution provides a closed-loop change and incident management process. Changes are automatically validated against the CMDB, and incidents are enriched with configuration data to accelerate resolution.

Asset Management

By integrating with Asset Management, you gain a complete lifecycle view of your IT assets, from procurement to disposal. This enables better financial planning and cost optimization.

Security & Resilience

Configuration Management is a core component of our Security & Resilience solutions. It ensures that all systems are configured securely and provides the foundation for our Zero Trust and Disaster Recovery offerings.

Business Service Mapping

When integrated with Business Service Mapping, you can visualize the relationships between your technical CIs and the business services they support. This provides a clear line of sight from IT infrastructure to business outcomes.
